Considerable experience and knowledge with working on remote teams, virtual teaming, having global responsibilities and cross-functional stakeholders. Delivery focused, with strengths in operational task management, communications management and meeting facilitation.

The concept of the network as the platform for transforming life's experiences is no longer a possibility: It is quickly becoming a reality. And Cisco is leading the experience.
